channel.title: Adding new items and objects
channel.description:
1st problem
ok i used phonescape as a source and ive already edited a lot so i dont want to downlaod a new source
when i tried to do pickup 15134 or something like that nothing came up i htink its because i dont have objects above 8000 or something i remember reading a tut when i was searching thru forums for items thing , that was adding stackable2 for the new items to stack properly so if anyone can give me a link to a forum or a page or tell me how to add the newest objects i will deeply appreciate it
2nd problem
i recently used a tutorial for adding objects and when i did Ctrl + F and searched for the add/make global object i didnt find it so i searched my client.java all the way and couldnt find it and im not an experienced coder im the opposite and dont know how to add it myself so if anyone can give me the code to for the adding global objects thing plz help
thanks for reading :) -ivan

item.title: Adding new items and objects
item.dc:creator: @ivang ivang
item.description:
@ivang wrote:

alright ty dell looks like you have alot of experience in coding from what i can see your rep is also 69 do you have a server ? i would like to check it out and btw ,

alright thanks you think i can find a tutorial here cuz i found one but it doesnt tell em the whole code for adding objects its the last piece of my puzzle to creating my server other than port fowarding

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new items and objects
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

phonescape <33
good memorys.

i helped create phonescape, added full range and mage and almost full specials but didnt want to release.

okay well umm, 1, phonescape is a 374 based server doesnt have the basic commands for a 503 server. which is what you are trying to achieve.

and 2, phonescape doesnt have a globalobject method, so try looking for another tut thats has one

and public void, your dumb dude i swear.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new items and objects
item.dc:creator: @public_void_mscpidio public void mscpidiots()
item.description:
@public_void_mscpidio wrote:

Just create the void, its simple simple stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new items and objects
item.dc:creator: @ivang ivang
item.description:
@ivang wrote:

no luck
i check itemhandler.java and client.java no luck i even searced GlobalObject and still NOTHING can you copy and paste your whole global objects until the break; plz you can delete your items i just want the code

Read full topic

item.title: Adding new items and objects
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

for the first problem, just find a item.cfg with more items in it. In other words, just download richscape (an example) and copy his item.cfg and replace it with yours

for the second problem, search for addglobalobject or makeglobalobject.

mine ismakeGlobalObject(2608, 3089, 4078, 0, 10);//wall

this is what one of my makeglobalobjects looks like

hope this helped

Read full topic
